beer.name: Sierra Nevada ESB Early Spring Beer
beer.description: Our ESB combines the best of English tradition with West Coast style. A blend of malts featuring British-grown Maris Otter is balanced with the earthy spiciness of hand-selected English and US hops. The ale is left unfiltered, which enhances mouthfeel and hop aroma creating a slightly reddish-copper hue.
beer.hops: English Challenger, U.S. Challenger, U.S. Goldings, & Crystal & East Kent Goldings
